mods.abstract: WSM's Noontime Neighbors, originally broadcast 1953-12-03, first five minutes only. Hosted by John McDonald and Tom Hanserd, with Chet Atkins, the Carlisles (Bill Carlisle, Betty Carlisle, Tommy Bishop), Owen Bradley and the Noontime Neighbor Band, with guest J. L. Swingley.

subject.topic: United States. Agricultural Stabilization and Conservation Service
